item.title: Zooming by fingers bug
item.description:
From pomni.o....@gmail.com on August 26, 2014 09:22:02
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.Open map 2.Zoom map by two fingers 3.You see map jumping(fast moving center of zooming)
Nexus 4, Android 4.4, mapsforge 0.5
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=517

item.contents:
From pomni.o....@gmail.com on August 26, 2014 01:04:07
Wow! It is working now) Thanks!

I've faced the same issue. But setLayerType(View.LAYER_TYPE_SOFTWARE, null); doesn't helps me. I even tried to turn off hardware acceleration for whole application in AndroidManifest with the same result. Does anyone have idea what is wrong? Nexus 4, mapsforge 0.5.0-rc3, Android 5.0
